job_info.title: Research Engineer - Gemini
job_info.description:
Join the Gemini team to build the next generation of multimodal AI models.
                Work on cutting-edge foundation models.
requirements: Experience with JAX, TensorFlow, or PyTorch
Background in NLP, Computer Vision, or Multimodal AI

highlights: Deployed Ollama, llama.cpp, vllm, TensorRT-LLM, mlc-llm
CureAgent framework, Executor-Analyst architecture, tool-augmented reasoning
Deployed on Thor, Orin, Jetson platforms with 4x latency reduction
